text: custom textbox and textbox/icon color, font...
BBCode in combo with custom effects and newlines:

[wave amp=60 freq=5]Waveeeee[/wave]
[tornado radius=5 freq=5]Tornadoooo[/tornado]
[shake rate=20 level=7]Shakeeeeee[/shake]
[rainbow freq=.1 sat=0.8 val=0.8 speed=1.0]Rainbowwwww[/rainbow]
hi! this whole project is just a silly lil thing im working on!
its nowhere near being finished, but if ud like to try it out im happy to share!
